input_email_body:
Subject: Query Regarding Payment Methods for Medical Data Services

Hello Customer Support, I am writing to gather information about the payment methods accepted for medical data services. Could you please furnish me with a comprehensive list of the accepted payment methods, such as credit cards, bank transfers, and online payment platforms? Additionally, I would be grateful if you could provide me with any essential information I might need. Moreover, could you also share any current discounts or promotions that might be applicable? I am eager to learn more and secure my medical data services My name is John Doe.. Thank you for your assistance You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. Please feel free to request any further details if needed.
